Class OptionalSupplier.Present<T>

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.invoke.OptionalSupplier.Present<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Supplier<T>, DeterministicSupplier<T>, OptionalSupplier<T>
Enclosing interface:
OptionalSupplier<T>
public static final class OptionalSupplier.Present<T> extends Object implements OptionalSupplier<T>
An OptionalSupplier implementation that supplies a fixed value.
Author:
Laird Nelson
